markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Order Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5076) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 218 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=213)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5073)

</column>

---

You gain the initial order spell from your order. This is a focus spell, granting you a focus pool or expanding that pool. You can Refocus by being one with nature. (For more on focus spells, see page 298.)
name: Order Spell
